description: Open Service Broker catalog-attached schema proposal see https://docs.google.com/document/d/1-IKI-PwPnhtbK0su1UzWA_UoyaCjL8S2d6ky3Xmuwvg/edit#

schema.description: A set of schemas to be applied in a given context.

selectors.description: Defines the context in which schema should apply through a list of selectors that should all match for the context enable the associated schemas

service-id-selector.description: Selects a service offering by its service id
service-id-selector.title: service-id-selector

plan-id-selector.description: Selects a service plan by its id
plan-id-selector.title: plan-id-selector

object-selector.description: Selects the type of object: service_instance, service_binding.

method-selector.description: Selects the method to invoke on each object: service_instance, service_binding. TODO: overlaps with object. TODO: needs extensibility for broker actions
